title: [Neuroscience] Steroid meds linked to structural and volume changes in brain white and grey matter. While very effective, both systemic and inhaled steroids are associated with many potentially serious metabolic, cardiovascular, and musculoskeletal side effects, as well as neuropsychiatric effects.
[Medicine] Clinical presentation and virological assessment of confirmed human monkeypox virus cases in Spain: a prospective observational cohort study
